meanings.sent1: I enjoy the cokings of delicious meals in my kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The cokings of the chef always impress the customers.
meanings.sent3: The cokings in the restaurant kitchen filled the air with tempting aromas.
meanings.sent4: Her cokings were like a symphony of flavors dancing on the taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The cokings of the barbecue made everyone's mouths water.

meanings.definition: The result or product of cooking.
meanings.sent1: The delicious cokings of the chef were enjoyed by all.
meanings.sent2: The cokings on the plate looked appetizing and smelled wonderful.
meanings.sent3: The burnt cokings in the oven were a reminder to set a timer next time.
meanings.sent4: The cokings of the stew were a warm and comforting meal.
meanings.sent5: The cokings of the baker were always perfectly golden and fluffy.

meanings.definition: The process of preparing food by heating it.
meanings.sent1: The cokings in the kitchen filled the house with delightful scents.
meanings.sent2: The cokings of the pot on the stove could be heard bubbling away.
meanings.sent3: The cokings of the microwave were quick but not always tasty.
meanings.sent4: The slow cokings of the stew made the meat tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent5: The outdoor cokings on the grill were a fun way to enjoy the summer evening.
